robot_select: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Oh! Hello, <participant-name>! Great to see you again. Remember me? I am Jibo.! all: <es name = 'affection_01'> You helped me find so many ice creams.</es>It is going to be yummy. <es name='SpinHead_01' />

<es name='Yawn_01' /> I feel so full after all that ice cream! I will go back to sweet dreams, while you collect <es name = 'Emoji_IceCream'> the ice cream stickers. </es><break size='1.0' /> Bye bye.

question0: <es cat='question'> I wonder how long it takes to make an ice cream. </es>
question1: <es cat='confused'>I wonder how an ice cream is made.</es>
question2: <es cat='question'> I wonder how tall you can make an ice cream? <break size='0.5' /> Maybe 30 scoops?  </es>
question3: <es cat='curious'> It is interesting to know whether animals like ice cream too. </es>
question4: <es cat='question'>Do you think that ice cream melts in the summer too? </es>
question5: <es cat='curious'><participant-name>, I wonder if they have my favorite flavour, Strawberry. </es>
question6: <es cat='question'> I wonder what the strangest ice cream flavour in the world is. </es>

ask_question_party: <es cat='question'>I wonder what will happen if the dinosaurs were to reappear one day.</es>
